author: Simon Difford
description: A Whiskey Sour smoothed by the addition of egg white and made more visually appealing and interesting by red wine tannins.
name: Greenwich Sour
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass
DRIZZLE red wine around surface of the drink
